critique: The executive order seems to aim to instill a sense of urgency and perhaps a bit of fear or concern regarding the potential consequences of the railroad strike. It also conveys a sense of authority and decisiveness in addressing the situation. The order does not seem to want to convey joy, but it does want to convey a sense of urgency and perhaps a bit of fear or concern regarding the potential consequences of the railroad strike. It also conveys a sense of authority and decisiveness in addressing the situation.
